Hotel_Name: Grosvenor House A JW Marriott Hotel
Negative_Review: They use 30mins to find the booking info I believe they are using interns rather than normal staffs everyone has no idea what is happening
Positive_Review: Very bad place can t image this is a 5 star

Hotel_Name: Grosvenor House A JW Marriott Hotel
Negative_Review: The room I booked via booking com was very small barely enough to walk around the bed I had to pay an extra GBP50 per room per night to upgrade Booking com needs to be clearer about the room size on your website and warn people when the room is exceptionally small

Hotel_Name: Grosvenor House A JW Marriott Hotel
Negative_Review: Air conditioning in the room was very noisy room 275 has what looks like the main plant to the building outside the window noisy all night This is an expensive hotel you would assume that you could get a good nights sleep If booking go 3rd or 4th floor up

Hotel_Name: Grosvenor House A JW Marriott Hotel
Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: I took my Nephew away for his 21st birthday trying to be a good Uncle and we needed a 2 twin bed arrangement When we arrived it was a King Queen not sure but I asked the desk to review my request and she said no problem we will correct it very nice at front desk Came back after some coffee and they gave us the same room with the king bed a roll away bed cot next to the closet which now we could t open Went down to front desk and then they apologized and said they would will fix it I asked can we just get another room They said no rooms available not sure about that Anyway they put 2 twin beds in the same room took out the king bed and left the cot So now we have 2 twin beds pushed together and a cot I asked can we have this cot removed we need to get into the closet Also need the beds to be separated Okay we will be right there they said from down at the front desk very pleasant I explained to the maids that came that we will not be sleeping together during the trip so the beds need to be separated which my nephew and I already were doing Her response was get this lol oh now don t fight your trip just started When she left my nephew said I think she thinks All in all The rooms are nice and the hotel great Location was perfect I recommend the trip If you can afford the larger room go for that and enjoy

Hotel_Name: Grosvenor House A JW Marriott Hotel
Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: The hotel was wonderful and staff very helpful and professional A big thank you for the surprise 40th birthday signature cheesecake and bottle of wine in our room Would love to return to this hotel one day The bar staff were fabulous and made me the most beautiful cocktail when I couldn t decide on what to drink

Hotel_Name: Grosvenor House A JW Marriott Hotel
Negative_Review: I wish the hotel was dog friendly then I would be able to spend holiday time there
Positive_Review: Very comfortable A great night s sleep Good shower Fantastic breakfast Lovely staff friendly and very efficient

Hotel_Name: Grosvenor House A JW Marriott Hotel
Negative_Review: you would not expect to wait for check in check out in 5 stars hotel rooms are not big but ok for London
Positive_Review: great location good hotel to stay for short visit to London

Hotel_Name: Grosvenor House A JW Marriott Hotel
Negative_Review: I didn t particularly liked the food of the room service order at 1 00am It was delivered pretty quick perhaps wasn t so fresh the pasta was badly overcooked and the ceaser salad there was way too much sauce compare how much salad there was shame really as the few lettuce I could test did taste quite fresh We also ordered an hamburger that was slightly better but still for the comparison quality price NO GOOD for me I do have to say that when I checked out I have gently complained to the reception and with much apologies and with no effort they haven t charge me for the ceaser salad and the pasta
Positive_Review: I liked the bedroom especially the size of the bed and the shower bath I liked all the staff that was very helpful all the way through outstanding from the concierge to the receptionist

Hotel_Name: Grosvenor House A JW Marriott Hotel
Negative_Review: They were doing a complete renovation on the 7th floor above the 6th where they placed me Hammers saws ungodly noise Staff was rude when changing Would never recommend this nightmare hotel

Hotel_Name: Grosvenor House A JW Marriott Hotel
Negative_Review: 1 I made my booking through Booking com type Deluxe King Room but I surprised when I checked in that this type of rooms did not exist originally and could not communicate with the management of Booking com Because there is no address to communicate in website 2 Upon check in they gave me a room for disabled people for one night 3 The front disc manager did t come to solve the problem and when I asked for it they told me that it was busy and after that she came

Hotel_Name: Grosvenor House A JW Marriott Hotel
Negative_Review: rooms not cleaned on time needs better lighting would have prefered better located room i checked in around 7pm and given probably worsed room i was recommended hotel by Jim Rai he worked previously at grosvener house Jim asked me to pass his regards to Stuart Barry who i think is the current general manager
Positive_Review: stayed 4 nights had to ask several times on 2 seperated days in late afternoon to clean my room room was dark dingy room 168 window overlooked a dump building material rubbish dumped out side my room

Hotel_Name: Grosvenor House A JW Marriott Hotel
Negative_Review: I felt the corridors were just a bit tired looking with some patches of worn carpet the guest room was also a bit old looking and we viewed on to a dull drab back court area had I been there on vacation or a longer stay I would have asked for a move
Positive_Review: the flower displays in the foyer were just gorgeous and the staff were friendly and helpful we had afternoon tea and it was good and very nicely presented Breakfast was very good with loads to chose from and our server was great and very helpful

Hotel_Name: Grosvenor House A JW Marriott Hotel
Negative_Review: free Wifi would have improved my overall stay especially when pay such a high price just for a room also free parking for guests should be included
Positive_Review: the food served in the Steakhouse was excellent highly recommend it

Hotel_Name: Grosvenor House A JW Marriott Hotel
Negative_Review: We booked a twin room and were told on arrival that there were none available After some time and an attempt at trying to get us to spend even more money on an upgraded room or an additional single bed the receptionist told us she had found a superior room with twin beds but it wouldn t be available until later in the day This was fine as we were spending the day in the city On arriving back to the hotel we were given our room keys and excitedly went to the room expecting a superior twin room Instead we got a standard room with one king sized bed I immediately rang down to reception and explained the situation The receptionist sounded surprised that we wanted a twin room and offered to send someone up to split the beds No one arrived for a good half an hour by which time we went in the middle of getting ready for our evening event being held at the hotel We send the member of staff away and asked him to come after 7 00 when we would have vacated the room 10 minutes later a member of housekeeping arrived with bedding for the twin beds we also sent her away asked her to come back later All this inconvenience certainly impacted on our overall experience and left us wondering why we had chosen to stay at a 5 hotel when clearly the service didn t match the rating I m not sure I would recommend the Grosvenor House Hotel to others after our experience

Hotel_Name: Grosvenor House A JW Marriott Hotel
Negative_Review: The food particularly breakfast was truly terrible I have actually had better in a Premier Inn Eggs seemed to be powdered sausages did not taste good pastries were dry coffee tasted like instant Not at all impressed It also took over an hour to serve me cocktails in the Park room I eventually had to get up and ask to be served
Positive_Review: An opulent feel Piano in the Park Room was a nice touch

Hotel_Name: Grosvenor House A JW Marriott Hotel
Negative_Review: I had a Junior suite The bed was only a queen size My brother got a king in his
Positive_Review: I loved there shower It felt like you were under a fire hose Great hotel

Hotel_Name: Grosvenor House A JW Marriott Hotel
Negative_Review: Better level of decoration for a 5 star hotel it was looking a bit tired in our room which was billed as a deluxe double
Positive_Review: The staff were just the best and the food although incredibly expensive was fantastic

Hotel_Name: Grosvenor House A JW Marriott Hotel
Negative_Review: the rooms on booking com are not of the regular rooms but rather the executive suites All the other rooms are not renovated and very dated they placed us on a smoking floor although we booked a twin room non smoking no one showed us where the coffee is the Starbucks in the hotel does not taste like Starbucks the wifi is not for free the receptionist did not give us a card for our luggage however later the concierge asked us for the card and gave us a hard time for not having it
Positive_Review: It was easy to find a taxi

Hotel_Name: Grosvenor House A JW Marriott Hotel
Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: We were made to feel welcome from the moment we arrived Arriving earlier than anticipated we were allowed access to our room which was a real bonus The staff throughout our stay could not have been friendlier

Hotel_Name: Grosvenor House A JW Marriott Hotel
Negative_Review: This year we had an issue with the mini bat not opening all visit and despite multiple requests it was never resolved Also the carpets need vacuuming more often
Positive_Review: We have stayed here for 6 Christmas visits in a row and it s always been fantastic Staff are friendly and location is amazing

Hotel_Name: Grosvenor House A JW Marriott Hotel
Negative_Review: The girls standing in the lobby to welcome guests and help them were not friendly and were behaving more like security personnels Wasn t welcomimg at all No sweet smiles
Positive_Review: The bed was comfortable and staff were really nice in particular the valet guys The entrance gate was closed as there was some red carpet event going on when we arrived The valet boys took charge straight away by taking our car to park it and took our bags out They took care of our initial arrival

Hotel_Name: Grosvenor House A JW Marriott Hotel
Negative_Review: There was nothing we didn t like at hotel however we attended the royal variety performance and were at the banquet A security guard caused chaos and was very rude to us and another group of three insisting we were not allowed in unless we removed our jackets He said this was hotel policy We asked to see manager but never did and eventually he allowed us all to enter It put a damper on that function

Hotel_Name: Grosvenor House A JW Marriott Hotel
Negative_Review: Why stop serving wine and food i the Executive Lounge at a time when guests are returning from theatre shows etc Even some cheeses biscuits bread would be nice with a glass of wine Really cheap And the breakfast is chaotic When myself and my wife got up from our table to get some cooked food leaving our half finished fruit juices and coffee s on the table we returned to find some people had taken our places and the table had been cleared We had to find somewhere else to sit This happened to two other couples whilst we were there
Positive_Review: Nice room good outlook onto Hyde Park great pillows

Hotel_Name: Grosvenor House A JW Marriott Hotel
Negative_Review: Not really value for money Breakfast was OK but for those prices I would have expected table service and not a buffett
Positive_Review: Staff efficiency and friendliness lunch Comfort of room

Hotel_Name: Grosvenor House A JW Marriott Hotel
Negative_Review: Just putting gold paint on reproduction antique furniture does not make it classy quite the opposite The decor was very random and lacking a coherent style
Positive_Review: The staff were wonderfully polite and friendly without doing resorting to the insincere bowing and scraping you get at some hotels The bed was incredibly comfortable Very hard to leave

Hotel_Name: Grosvenor House A JW Marriott Hotel
Negative_Review: 1 I requested red rose petals on the bed for my wife as we stayed in the hotel for our 10 year wedding anniversary My request was ignored with no explanation 2 Pillows were too high and there was no option for flatter pillows in the room I did not get a good night sleep 3 Breakfast was very basic compared to other 5 star hotels Not enough vegetarian options 4 Wifi is not free 5 The shower in the bathroom has 2 heads the portable head did not work only the overhead rain shower worked I m disappointed in the value for money
Positive_Review: The location is good and the staff are pleasant Checking in was easy Facilities are decent bar and afternoon tea dining area

Hotel_Name: Grosvenor House A JW Marriott Hotel
Negative_Review: Bedroom was very poor quality for nearly 300 for the night Admittedly I arrived early this attend an event at the hotel and rather than leave my bags until check in time I was offered early check in into a smaller room with complimentary breakfast an offer that I accepted However I hadn t expected the room to be so small and cramped even for single occupancy I struggled to find enough surface space for my belongings plus kettle etc The bed was small with a very soft sloping mattress that made me feel I was rolling out of bed It was a very uncomfortable night and very poor value for money
Positive_Review: Lovely hotel A repeat stay for me and in this occasion it was particularly convenient as I was attending an event there on the same day

Hotel_Name: Grosvenor House A JW Marriott Hotel
Negative_Review: Location of the room inside view I could see only the pipelines Bathroom water sewage was very slow to go so I had to reduce control the water flow

Hotel_Name: Grosvenor House A JW Marriott Hotel
Negative_Review: Breakfast was expensive at 29 and wasn t included in the room rate The shower although powerful was lukewarm which was disappointing
Positive_Review: The lobby area and reception was very opulent which is to be expected from park lane The room was comfortable especially the beds

Hotel_Name: Grosvenor House A JW Marriott Hotel
Negative_Review: To have had breakfast included
Positive_Review: Being surrounded by luxury The staff were very helpful and friendly Also being allowed into our rooms before check in time

Hotel_Name: Grosvenor House A JW Marriott Hotel
Negative_Review: We had an event in the Great Room and the security staff bouncer was very rude to my partner when leaving considering we were residents at the hotel which spoilt our night

Hotel_Name: Grosvenor House A JW Marriott Hotel
Negative_Review: nothing
Positive_Review: it had long been an ambition to stay at the hotel the service I received from checking in to departure were of a standard that I had long dreamed to visit Rhyad Frout the FOH manager delivered a level of service and personel approach that is praise worthy in making our wedding anniversary one to be remembered

Hotel_Name: Grosvenor House A JW Marriott Hotel
Negative_Review: No concerns
Positive_Review: Staff friendly professional polite helpful and efficient Great bars Breakfast choices good and breakfast room spacious with pleasant view

Hotel_Name: Grosvenor House A JW Marriott Hotel
Negative_Review: Nothing
Positive_Review: The staff at this hotel were exceptional Especially a staff member by the name of Claudia Olteam She s a real asset to this hotel and did everything in her power to make sure my stay was comfortable and enjoyable Thank you Claudia

Hotel_Name: Grosvenor House A JW Marriott Hotel
Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: The hotel is beautifully designed very elegant and the bedroom was extremely comfortable The check in and check out experience was good and the Doormen were lovely o

Hotel_Name: Grosvenor House A JW Marriott Hotel
Negative_Review: Nothing
Positive_Review: Loved the location close to Oxford Street Buckingham Palace Bond Street and Harrods Loved the Executive Lounge food was great and open from 6 00 a m until 11 00 p m

Hotel_Name: Grosvenor House A JW Marriott Hotel
Negative_Review: Bad house keeping the standard room is very tiny when we check in they gave us avery bad room and the ceiling was dropping water we ask them to change the room but they refuse claiming that the hotel is fully booked We had to wait until they fixed it because my booking was no refundable very bad hotel

Hotel_Name: Grosvenor House A JW Marriott Hotel
Negative_Review: Bathroom needed updating and a deep clean Bath fittings had limescale tiles needed re grouting resealing Overpriced for the room standard Terrible view of back of hotel First hotel I ve stayed where receptionist did not ask how my stay was at check out
Positive_Review: Location was excellent Lobby area was pleasant Staff were pleasant Concierge service helped us with a forgotten item Small comfortable room

Hotel_Name: Grosvenor House A JW Marriott Hotel
Negative_Review: Two times i call the house keeping to clean my room and no repsonse since my room was the last room they dont check the sign on my door when i checked out there was a lot of mistakes with my receipt many items were added to my room

Hotel_Name: Grosvenor House A JW Marriott Hotel
Negative_Review: Where to start 1 Reception employees are way too rude and don t belong to 5 stars chain hotels 2 Cleaneness of the room is a disaster 3 When you call house keeping no one appears to care about your logical demands I had to call three times to get my room cleaned then I approached reception where I was promised to get the service needed immediately but guess what NO ONE CAME TO THE ROOM 4 If you call concierge you d be lucky if someone attend to your call 5 The bath top is so old the water does not get drained You d get soaked in dirty water and soap And when you ask for the issue to be repaired you d be lucky if they ever intend to do it 6 The mattress is so old your back will suffer and you d need to seek for medical help by the time you re trip is over 7 The waiterses at the steak house where breakfast is served are out of knowledge of the basic hospitality issues This hotel does not deserve the huge amount of money I ve paid for The service I received at this hotel I would assume a no star hotel would offer One thing for certain I WILL NEVER STAY AT THIS HOTEL AGAIN
Positive_Review: The only good thing about this hotel is the great location

Hotel_Name: Grosvenor House A JW Marriott Hotel
Negative_Review: Unfortunately I didn t feel safe at all the room was not cleaned properly the staff are not professional and vet rude you don t feel you are in a 5 star hotel the service level has gone down a lot since my last visit in 2014 No respect shown for the people a lot more I can write pages Note They have drawn 500 pounds from my visa account and still not released yet The staff always a looking for tips

Hotel_Name: Grosvenor House A JW Marriott Hotel
Negative_Review: Super expensive for what you get size a little bit run down needs a refurb No pool unfortunately
Positive_Review: Perfectly located facing Hyde Park great food

Hotel_Name: Grosvenor House A JW Marriott Hotel
Negative_Review: Breakfast wasn t that great so i wanted to cancel it from room rate and hotel refused even though i booked a refundable rate The shisha place in the lobby is verrry over priced first time i find shisha in london for 100 pounds including taxes

Hotel_Name: Grosvenor House A JW Marriott Hotel
Negative_Review: We would have liked a swimming pool to be available somewhere nearby if not on the premises Also the pianist playing in the lounge lobby would have been very welcome some evenings rather than just some afternoons
Positive_Review: Everything was lovely although the food was ridiculously expensive

Hotel_Name: Grosvenor House A JW Marriott Hotel
Negative_Review: I think the hotel is starting to get a little tiered the beds are very soft the air con doesn t work very well The rest of the hotel is great
Positive_Review: The service was always with a smile they always tried to help from the doorman to the reception The staff in the executive club room were amazing

Hotel_Name: Grosvenor House A JW Marriott Hotel
Negative_Review: Even though we were unexpectedly upgraded to a superior King the room was very tired and dated For almost 400 a night we expected much much more

Hotel_Name: Grosvenor House A JW Marriott Hotel
Negative_Review: Room was much smaller then expected for the price Decor could use a bit of updating Shower took a while to work out how to use and the water pressure wasn t great Had to get someone to come and fix the TV as it kept switching off It got fixed then the next day it played up again
Positive_Review: Bed was comfy Breakfast was good Good location Staff were helpful

Hotel_Name: Grosvenor House A JW Marriott Hotel
Negative_Review: I didn t like to be asked if I did not like any thing in this hotel It is amazing
Positive_Review: I like always to be a reasonable in giving my feedback about any service The first rule of me being reasonable is to avoid giving extreme rates such as 1 very poor and 10 very excellent However I asked myself why is not a reasonable to give 10 from 10 for such amazing experience with JW Marriott Hotel Grosvenor House I felt ashamed to not give 10 I should always give 10 for many reasons and one condition I got since I started my relation with this hotel The reasons could not be all included in my current memory and my busy time in my PhD study But I have several examples One is when I arrived several times to this hotel before 12 pm I knew that I should wait till 3 pm to be checked in but I learnt with this hotel that I could always get my room Every time I got my room around 12 pm which is big thing for me Second is when I meet every member of the hotel I got the feeling of how they are professional Being professional in the context of hotel services is scarcely to been seen Third is how clean their rooms are Fourth is how delicious their food is Fifth is how I missed my staying in their hotel It is difficult for me to miss any place that not my house but I missed their hotel I just listed several examples Now it is about my condition with this hotel I am living in the north of England This hotel is expensive for my budget I love visiting London BUT since I knew this hotel this is what happened to me I cannot go many times to London because my feeling cannot accept any hotel if it was not Grosvenor House which is expensive for me So instead of going to London many times in one year I save the money of the many times to be able to go few times to London with the ability of staying at their hotel I had several experiences with other nice hotels in London such as the Savoy hotel but since I knew this hotel I cannot book a train to London before book a staying at this hotel

Hotel_Name: Grosvenor House A JW Marriott Hotel
Negative_Review: Water tap was really stiff hard to open and hard to close Our King size bed was two single beds you can feel the line in the middle Can t empty minibar they would give you another fridge for your own use
Positive_Review: Amazing stay nice furnitures great staff and would like to help you if you asked I really like this hotel

Hotel_Name: Grosvenor House A JW Marriott Hotel
Negative_Review: Paid wifi is ridiculous for a 5 star hotel We arrived 5 mins late back from breakfast and we had been locked out of our room Had to go to reception to get the key reinstated only to be told that we had been checked out I received no receipt and forgot to ask for it as there was such a drama about getting back to the room which was stupid of me and unprofessional of them
Positive_Review: The Beds were gorgeous Room was comfortable and sizable The shower was super excellent choice of restaurants to suit all palettes Location is lovely

Hotel_Name: Grosvenor House A JW Marriott Hotel
Negative_Review: I used to stay at this hotel many times for the last 5 years It was always great but now it s completely different Small room and not very clean Reception was bad

Hotel_Name: Grosvenor House A JW Marriott Hotel
Negative_Review: The state of the extra matress that was stained was not a good omen Nobody replied to phone calls from reception and concierge until we had called 3 or 4 or 5 times

Hotel_Name: Grosvenor House A JW Marriott Hotel
Negative_Review: 1 the wifi in the room is not free its 5 star hotel and the price of the hotel is hight why should i pay for a day 10 ponid for using wifii 2 u cant go to the lobby cafe with wearing traning mataryal also if the waetter is frezing out side u must change ur cloose to seet in the lobby cafe its un fair we are travalling i were what i wont to were why shold i bring party dress to drink a tea in the lobby

Hotel_Name: Grosvenor House A JW Marriott Hotel
Negative_Review: Food orderd from room service was not good not tastey Checking out was very diassapointing as Ms Canidice did not understand and follow my instructions in regarding the final payment Also her manager Livia was not helpful I think Both should not work in customer service as they both lacked many skills This has been raised to their manager I will reconsier staying in the hotel in my next trip to london
Positive_Review: As returned guest i liked the check in experiance Mr Jaspher was excellent to us Nice rooms quick service Good breakfast

Hotel_Name: Grosvenor House A JW Marriott Hotel
Negative_Review: Was asked if id like a text when our room was ready never got it Fire alarm went off 4 times during one night between 3 30am and 4 00am No apology from staff the next day or an explanation as to why
Positive_Review: Breakfast was delicious and the rooms were comfortable

Hotel_Name: Grosvenor House A JW Marriott Hotel
Negative_Review: When my colleague myself booked our rooms we booked a deluxe twin or double We are not sure we actually got that as when we checked in they told us they were changing our room allocation then we went to our rooms on floor 1 mine was a disabled twin room which looked at a wall the services building my colleagues room was very small with a claustrophobic bathroom you could sit on the toilet clean your teeth other the sink at the same time
Positive_Review: The venue was great and the facilities were good but you would expect that from this hotel

Hotel_Name: Grosvenor House A JW Marriott Hotel
Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: you should not be told and made to feel ashamed for coming through booking com The checkout duty officer was very rude and made me pay for internet over three days quoting that i am coming through Booking com eventhough am a loyal marriott guy never again

Hotel_Name: Grosvenor House A JW Marriott Hotel
Negative_Review: not a good start with us booking a super king bedroom and the first room was a queen size this happened in both the rooms we booked we did change but was very inconvenient the bathroom was very pokey and had a view of the air conditioning units we won t be back
Positive_Review: the new renovations are lovely downstairs

Hotel_Name: Grosvenor House A JW Marriott Hotel
Negative_Review: The fact that breakfast service stops at 11 am is a bid old fashioned given the lifestyles and behaviors of the clientele Although they might be older by passport they stay up long sleep in and then would like to have a proper breakfast even when its 1pm The person preparing the Starbucks coffee had no idea milk overheated although great coffee bad preparation
Positive_Review: loved the location and the service very much Starbucks coffee available

Hotel_Name: Grosvenor House A JW Marriott Hotel
Negative_Review: I thought I had booked a twin room but got a double The bathroom was very tired one light not working at all one constantly flickering and the bath tap itself dripping what appeared to be oil when I ran it Breakfast was very expensive The room itself had no view at all apart from the windows of other rooms
Positive_Review: The room service sandwiches were very tasty but too big and too expensive

Hotel_Name: Grosvenor House A JW Marriott Hotel
Negative_Review: Body wash etc The bottles are rather tiny a few more in the room would have gone down a treat They smelled so nice
Positive_Review: We loved the bed such a good night s sleep and so comfy I loved the tea and coffee facilities too It was great to have a cup of tea as and when required In addition your coffee shop in house is a great idea So amazingly so when you don t want to venture out for a coffee shop establishment Thank you

Hotel_Name: Grosvenor House A JW Marriott Hotel
Negative_Review: Noise in the lobby for the renovations
Positive_Review: Staff Breakfast Room Giancarlo Fanigliulo from reception was great and helpful Laura van Nimwegen Lobby hostess was sooooo nice to us and she will be on of the reasosn to come back to the hotel Thanks Laura

Hotel_Name: Grosvenor House A JW Marriott Hotel
Negative_Review: in terms of wifi access this is the worst hotel I have stayed in Separate log in for room ballroom restaurant but free wi fi at check in They want to charge you for use of Internet in your room at a basic speed and an extra charge for faster with a separate log in for each device We were at a conference in the ballroom and I asked for an Internet password so we could tweet real time They failed to fix it We couldn t tweet via wifi Suggested it was the conference organisers fault I gave them feedback nicely and they refunded my room internet charge but since my complaint they have totally mis understood what I said They replied I m sorry you didn t get the internet speed you wanted Complete mess up Hopefully after this review someone might get it
Positive_Review: Staff friendly Food good charming people wanting to help

Hotel_Name: Grosvenor House A JW Marriott Hotel
Negative_Review: It s lost all its former glitz and glamour it s now rather drab and lacks any atmosphere Real shame as it s an iconic property in a great location

Hotel_Name: Grosvenor House A JW Marriott Hotel
Negative_Review: There s wasn t anything we didn t like We ll certainly stay at the Grosvenor House again
Positive_Review: Spacious room Wonderfully comfortable beds My daughter and I had come to London to celebrate my 67th birthday 14 February and to see Miss Saigon Our stay at the Grosvenor House made the weekend truly memorable

Hotel_Name: Grosvenor House A JW Marriott Hotel
Negative_Review: the bed was so uncomfortable as it was a king size made of two separate matreses We complained and they gave us a different bedroom which is amazing but the matres is soft which is not comfy to me Besides I think it is too expensive for what u get
Positive_Review: Location The classic style of the hotel gives an amazing cozy feeling

Hotel_Name: Grosvenor House A JW Marriott Hotel
Negative_Review: Some significant regeneration work in the lobby made it a bit tricky to find things but staff were on hand to help
Positive_Review: Staff were very attentive and friendly The room was a lovely size well set out and quiet

Hotel_Name: Grosvenor House A JW Marriott Hotel
Negative_Review: The view pipes and air con equipment The fact that the Executive lounge does not serve alcoholic drinks until 5pm Also does not offer lunch of any kind
Positive_Review: Location size of the room the shower and the bed Breakfast in the lounge

Hotel_Name: Grosvenor House A JW Marriott Hotel
Negative_Review: Unfortunately the rooms were not to my taste Some people like oldern style rooms however my taste is modern contemporary so was not for me However if you prefer a more english style decor than this is for you
Positive_Review: Staff were excellent very friendly and accommodating and helpful from the valet reception through to the management

Hotel_Name: Grosvenor House A JW Marriott Hotel
Negative_Review: Very expensive for the content when you see the price you will think you will stay in luxury hotel but it s very normal hotel I stayed in 4 stars hotel last year and this year in grosvenor house and I feel comfortable on the 4 stars The room was very very very very small so you will for location not for nice rooms and to stay at

Hotel_Name: Grosvenor House A JW Marriott Hotel
Negative_Review: Nothing
Positive_Review: We stayed at the Grosvenor House Hotel as a large group as we were getting married in Mayfair Library on 21st December The hotel was everything we dreamed of and more Even though the hotel had been undergoing major renovations and was being put back to normal when we arrived the staff made everything perfect Our rooms weren t ready when we arrived but the staff looked after us and arranged for us to have drinks and to relax while we waited As a goodwill gesture Javier gave us free wifi for our entire stay as well as one day free parking due to having to wait around half an hour We had our 2 grandaughters with us and the staff sent a baby pack to the room for the youngest which included toiletries etc On the day of our wedding I was treat like a celebrity by the staff We wanted somewhere to have a drink with guests and the staff arranged that as well as sending chocolate covered strawberries to our room with a congratulations message with them The final touch was a beautiful bouquet of flowers from the hotel as we were checking out Thankyou to the staff of the hotel for a wonderful stay

Hotel_Name: Grosvenor House A JW Marriott Hotel
Negative_Review: The cost per room size was on the high side for a room with no real view and next to ventilation equipment
Positive_Review: The staff were thorough and quick to deal with requests The general hotel was pleasant

Hotel_Name: Grosvenor House A JW Marriott Hotel
Negative_Review: Very lumpy beds building work going on in reception area that we didn t know about
Positive_Review: The ambiance of this hotel is always fabulous at Christmas time

Hotel_Name: Grosvenor House A JW Marriott Hotel
Negative_Review: Housekeeping banged on the door at 8am waking me up and wouldn t go away until I answered the door and then wanted to know what time I was checking out As I had only got to bed at 3am and was one of the reasons I chose a hotel with a 12 noon check out my entire nights sleep was ruined but I was still charged over 400 for the pleasure

Hotel_Name: Grosvenor House A JW Marriott Hotel
Negative_Review: I wish if there was more security in the lifts leading to the rooms like card access also i didn t notice any cctv installed in the way to my room which is a bit scary for me
Positive_Review: I had a peaceful time good location and multiple access

Hotel_Name: Grosvenor House A JW Marriott Hotel
Negative_Review: Booked a twin room to be told there were none left Staff were very slow at desk Offered a superior twin on the smoking floor As I was traveling with a colleague and didn t want to share a queen sized bed the only option on the non smoking floor I was told I had to agree It was a big but smelly room with only four pods of milk so just the two cups of tea each in 24h Later on found colleagues had been upgraded to a room on the no smoking floor with two double beds Extra cost for in room wifi
Positive_Review: The welcome from the doorman was great Checkout was quick

Hotel_Name: Grosvenor House A JW Marriott Hotel
Negative_Review: Room too small Receptionist very slow tried to charge me for late checkout at 2pm Couldn t coordinate getting bags from room as I was leaving wanted me to wait for a ticket

Hotel_Name: Grosvenor House A JW Marriott Hotel
Negative_Review: A few weird looks from greeters doormen probably because I wasn t wearing a suit and had arrived on foot instead of being driven there in a Mercedes
Positive_Review: Very professional staff extremely comfortable bed well equipped gym fantastic food Lots of space even in a standard room

Hotel_Name: Grosvenor House A JW Marriott Hotel

Hotel_Name: Grosvenor House A JW Marriott Hotel
Negative_Review: Nothing
Positive_Review: Its a wonderful hotel the location is perfect near hyde park oxford st and knightsbridge all by walking The room is big and comfortable The housekeeping comes twice per day to ensure everything is clean I strongly recommend it

Hotel_Name: Grosvenor House A JW Marriott Hotel
Negative_Review: We were expecting a room with a view No paper in the morning Room was set u for 2 single beds when we requested a double room Internet I had to pay for and then get a credit took 8 hours to get the bags bought up to our room Not much selection for breakfast for the executive suite which we had

Hotel_Name: Grosvenor House A JW Marriott Hotel
Negative_Review: The doorman would not let my wife into the hotel and questioned her twice about her room number and then proceeded to shut the door in her face At breakfast we were asked which table we would like and we chose a table by the window only then to be told that we could not sit at that table because it was for 4 people the next people in was a lady and daughter who were shown to the very same table we requested we will always remember this hotel for all the wrong reasons We have a party of 12 American businessmen and women working for our company for two weeks and we will not proceed with the booking at this hotel The Dorchester for us every time from now on

Hotel_Name: Grosvenor House A JW Marriott Hotel

Positive_Review: The staff are very friendly and helpfull

Hotel_Name: Grosvenor House A JW Marriott Hotel
Negative_Review: The receptionist promised to include the breakfast during the first 3 days stay as a new guest but that not happened Just to avoid build the wrong perception the front desk should be very transparent and honest with the guest Please take it positive and don t miss understand me but this could impact the reputation of the hotel Thanks
